nodes.text: A script was used on a door in the Rebellion's hidden base on Hoth.
It was present on a label on a door that was passed by Han Solo, Princess Leia Organa, and C-3PO on their way to the Millennium Falcon during the Battle of Hoth.

This script was featured more prominently in a deleted scene in Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, where it was used in a sequence in which C-3PO led Imperial snowtroopers to a hidden room which contained a Wampa. The label is still visible in the hallway in Echo Base in the final versions of the film, right before the tunnel collapses. In the non-canon Hoth level in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition, a similar label is on doors containing Wampas, but the text is in Aurebesh.
Due to the angle of the scene, it is unclear whether this script is Star Wars '76 designed by Joe Johnston, Common Sith or some other as yet unidentified script.
